message: Toue signals to Alpha-2, who promptly turns to face me.
I try to escape, but he grabs my arm.
Fuck! It's like I'm caught in a vise. I can't get away.

name: 東江
message: "Can't have you thinking I forgot about you, now."

name: 東江
message: "My data regarding your voice is woefully limited. It took so long for us to find you."

name: 東江
message: "And that's why I'm going to need your help to investigate it thoroughly."
Alpha-2 starts to drag me away.
Alpha punches Clear hard in the face. Somehow, Clear manages to stay on his feet.
Laughing, Alpha unleashes another flurry of attacks.
Alpha kicks Clear in the stomach, dropping him to his knees. Red blood spills from his mouth, and more pieces of skin break away.
I sniff the air, but what I smell isn't blood. Is this... oil?

name: クリアα
message: "Well, I think it's time to put you outta your misery. Don't worry. I'll make it quick."
Alpha smiles at Clear with the joy of a predator who knows his prey can't escape.

name: クリア
message: "...I'm defective. That means you can't predict what I'll do."

name: クリア
message: "So I have nothing to fear anymore. I'm completely outside your calculations. Aren't I?"

name: クリア
message: "In which case... I can act of my own free will."
Clear pulls something from his coat pocket.
With a fearless grin, Clear presses the tip of the knife into his own head.
What the hell is he doing?!
With an astonished whisper, Toue holds up a hand. Alpha-2 immediately stops dragging me away.

name: クリア
message: "If I'm remembering right, the circuit for the hard lock is somewhere around here."

name: クリアα
message: "You wouldn't. It makes no sense. You'd have to be crazy!"
Clear glances at me. His eyes glisten with affection and sadness.

name: クリア
message: "I'm going to keep my promise, okay? I'm going to keep you safe no matter what."

name: クリア
message: "This is the first thing I've ever truly wanted―wanted for myself, of my own free will."
He flashes a smile―fragile, fleeting―and tightens his grip on the handle of the knife.
I scream, desperate to stop him. His sad eyes are all I see.
Pain rips through my skull. It feels like my own head is about to explode.

name: タエ
message: "And if you want to dig even deeper―get to know them even better―all you need to do is ask, and their mind will open to you."
